default_values.name: default_start_time_utc
default_values.hint: The default UTC starting time of each evening session. Overridden on call to roll_call by user input.

default_values.name: minute_offset
default_values.hint: The minute value of the offset between the start_time_utc and the beginning of the session.

default_values.name: second_offset
default_values.hint: The seconds value of the offset between the start_time_utc and the beginning of the session.

default_values.name: microsecond_offset
default_values.hint: The microseconds value of the offset between the start_time_utc and the beginning of the session.

default_values.name: help_message
default_values.value:
Bob is a bot. And does Bob the Bot do?
Bob the Bot does your beloved CB roll call.
But how can I get Bob the Bot to do what Bob the Bot does?
At the beginning of the CB week, type `/roll_call` followed by the UTC starting time of the CB session, and 5 emotes for people to react to.
And then, sit and watch :wink:
default_values.hint: Days of CB sessions - from 'Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun'
